statements: SELECT * FROM MentalHealthPatients;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM MentalHealthPatients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM MentalHealthPatients WHERE outcome = 'Improving';
SELECT * FROM MentalHealthPatients ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT COUNT(patient_id) AS total_patients FROM MentalHealthPatients;
SELECT * FROM MentalHealthPatients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY patient_name DESC, gender ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, gender FROM MentalHealthPatients WHERE gender = 'Female' AND age BETWEEN 20 AND 40;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis, treatment_plan FROM MentalHealthPatients WHERE outcome = 'Improving' ORDER BY patient_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM MentalHealthPatients WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%anxiety%' OR diagnosis LIKE '%depression%' LIMIT 5 OFFSET 3;
SELECT patient_name, gender, treatment_plan, outcome FROM MentalHealthPatients WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY outcome DESC;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, age, diagnosis FROM Patients;
SELECT * FROM Treatments ORDER BY treatment_date DESC;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM Patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT treatment_name, provider_name, outcome FROM Treatments WHERE treatment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE age > 50 ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT patient_id, diagnosis FROM Patients WHERE age < 30 ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Treatments WHERE treatment_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' AND outcome = 'Successful';
SELECT patient_name, age, provider_name FROM Patients p JOIN Treatments t ON p.patient_id = t.patient_id WHERE t.outcome = 'Failed';
SELECT * FROM Researchers;
SELECT researcher_name, research_area FROM Researchers ORDER BY researcher_name ASC;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM MentalHealthPatients WHERE patient_age > 30;
SELECT outcome_id, patient_id, treatment FROM PatientOutcomes WHERE outcome LIKE '%improved%';
SELECT * FROM Researchers JOIN MentalHealthPatients ON Researchers.researcher_id = MentalHealthPatients.patient_id;
SELECT researcher_name, research_area FROM Researchers ORDER BY researcher_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Researchers WHERE research_area = 'Psychology';
SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM MentalHealthPatients WHERE patient_age > 30;
SELECT * FROM PatientOutcomes WHERE treatment LIKE '%therapy%';
SELECT r.researcher_name, p.patient_name, o.outcome FROM Researchers r, MentalHealthPatients p, PatientOutcomes o WHERE r.researcher_id = 1 AND p.patient_id = o.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT provider_name, specialty FROM providers ORDER BY provider_name ASC;
SELECT t.provider_id, p.provider_name, t.treatment_id, t.cost FROM treatments t JOIN providers p ON t.provider_id = p.provider_id WHERE cost < 500;

SELECT patient_name, treatment_name, outcome, satisfaction_rating FROM patients p JOIN outcomes o ON p.patient_id = o.patient_id JOIN treatments t ON o.treatment_id = t.treatment_id WHERE diagnosis = 'Cancer';
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT treatment_name, cost FROM treatments WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY cost DESC;
SELECT provider_name, specialty, location FROM providers WHERE specialty = 'Cardiology' ORDER BY provider_name ASC;

SELECT patient_name, treatment_name, outcome FROM patients JOIN outcomes ON patients.patient_id = outcomes.patient_id JOIN treatments ON outcomes.treatment_id = treatments.treatment_id WHERE satisfaction_rating > 4 ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM PatientDemographics WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT patient_id, diagnosis, age FROM PatientDemographics ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM PatientOutcomes WHERE outcome='Successful' AND recovery_time < 10;
SELECT DISTINCT researcher_name, specialization FROM ResearcherInfo;
SELECT report_title, analysis_results FROM ResearcherReports WHERE researcher_id=2;
SELECT * FROM PatientDemographics WHERE age > 50;
SELECT patient_id, diagnosis FROM PatientDemographics WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM PatientOutcomes ORDER BY recovery_time ASC;
SELECT researcher_name, specialization FROM ResearcherInfo WHERE specialization LIKE '%medicine%';
SELECT report_title, analysis_results FROM ResearcherReports WHERE researcher_id = 2;
